channel.title: Featured tutorial wording
channel.description:
The best tutorials of the website are in this board, exclusively.
I am suggesting it becomes The best tutorials on the website are kept in this board exclusively. Just bad grammar/sort of sounded wrong to me. To be totally truthful, I am not really proud of my own either but it still looks better I do believe.

item.title: Featured tutorial wording
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

The best tutorials of the website are in this board, exclusively.

I am suggesting it becomes

The best tutorials on the website are kept in this board exclusively.

Just bad grammar/sort of sounded wrong to me. To be totally truthful, I am not really proud of my own either but it still looks better I do believe.
